description: This collision occurred on the M2 citybound at the junction for Fortwilliam.
title: Belfast: Two taken to Royal Victoria Hospital after M2 crash
title_page: Belfast: Two taken to Royal Victoria Hospital after M2 crash - BBC News
maintext:
Two people have been taken to the Royal Victoria hospital after a crash on the M2 motorway, the Northern Ireland Ambulance Service (NIAS) has said.
The NIAS said it despatched two emergency crews after it received a call at 06:02 GMT on Monday.
Police had closed the motorway citybound from the Fortwilliam junction while the damage was cleared. The road is now open.
The collision resulted in tailbacks beyond the Sandyknowes Roundabout.
